Testing the content of pages

Presentation, video, and technical specification for page-level accessibility testing before publish.

This feature checks different objects or parts of a page before publishing so authors can resolve issues early instead of fixing mistakes after release. Regular use also helps authors learn to avoid accessibility errors.

Start here: Main results · HISTORY.md

Technical specification: Technical specification - Testing the content of pages (PDF).

Original page: /archive/accessibilitycluster.com_20240303/main-results/testing-the-content-of-pages/.

Contact: we4authors@funka.com
